title: Slowly and Leisurely, their Free Time.

text_block_list.text: When I was walking the streets after finishing my errands on my day off… I happened to run into Wonder Acute.
I was taking a leisurely stroll, since I didn't have any errands today. The weather today is nice for that, isn't it?
text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute

text_block_list.text: It certainly was the best type of weather to take a stroll in.
choice_data_list: … If you don't mind, want to stroll together?

text_block_list.text: Oh my, is that okay?
choice_data_list: I have nothing better to do, so it's fine.
text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute

text_block_list.text: Is that so? Hm, alrighty—
text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute

text_block_list.text: … Ah, I got it. It's a bit far, but I have somewhere I want to show you, would you mind following me?
text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute

text_block_list.text: And thus, I followed Wonder Acute to the place she wanted to show me. Surprisingly, that place was a billiard hall.
Oh, not at all, this is the first time I've come here. Rickey invited me here to play next time we meet up.
text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute

text_block_list.text: And I had the thought that you would have an interest in this modern game too—
text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute

text_block_list.text: "The event is now under way! Are you able to pocket the ball in this position!? You get 2 tries! The winner will win an extravagant prize!"
text_block_list.name: Hall Announcer

text_block_list.text: An extravagant prize? Oh my, a free "all you can play" ticket for the day! Rickey would be quite happy with it, but… I wonder if I can even win it…
choice_data_list: Looks interesting, let's give it a try.
text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute

text_block_list.text: (Clack!)
Oh my! You're amazing at this! If only it went just a tiny bit further. I'd never be able to do it, but Trainer, you're very skilled at this.
text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute

text_block_list.text: Unfortunately, my first attempt ended in failure. I only had one more attempt. I got too nervous that I put too much power in my shoulders.

Fufufu, deep breaths, Trainer, deep breaths～ 
In times like this, you just need to take one breath.
text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute

text_block_list.text: After me, Inhale… exhale…
text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute

text_block_list.text: … Wonder Acute's smile alongside the relaxed atmosphere, my shoulders started to relax… And with that—
(Clack! Rattle rattle plop!)
Ho wa wa!
text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute

text_block_list.text:
It went in, you pocketed it! 
As expected you're really amazing, Trainer!
choice_data_list: It was all thanks to you!
text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute

text_block_list.text:
Now what did I do? All I did was watch. 
It's your accomplishment.
text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute

text_block_list.text: Falco told me about this place. I thought that you would like a place that's quite "Uma-stable".
text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute

text_block_list.text: Thank you for waiting～! Here's you 'Pancake the Mountain, lots of whipped cream and fruit butter!
text_block_list.name: Cafe Employee
choice_data_list: Whoa… it really is a mountain!

text_block_list.text:
Whoa～, wowee… that's quite grand… 
It feels like we'll be blessed a bit with how grand it looks.
text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute

text_block_list.text: Thank you kindly, thank you kindly…
text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute

text_block_list.text: Now that she mentioned it, it was a little miraculous to be able to see such an impressive pancake mountain. I should also—
choice_data_list: Thank you kindly, thank you kindly

text_block_list.text: Fufufu, with that done, how about we partake in this meal.
text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute

text_block_list.text: (Nom nom)
Oh my! It's so fluffy and delicious!
text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute

text_block_list.text: It's been a while since I was able to enjoy eating out while feeling grateful like this. It made it taste all the better.
Tarumae told me about this shop. Trainer, you said you were looking for a new jacket, right?
text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute

text_block_list.text: Look, how about this one? The material seems nice and the durability of it is quite nice too, isn't it?
choice_data_list: Looks good! I'll try it on right now!
text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute

text_block_list.text:
Oh, Trainer, it looks great on you! 
Can you turn around for me too?
text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute

text_block_list.text:
Oh deary, the back of it has a hole. 
Looks like some bugs ate through it.
text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute

text_block_list.text:
Da-mage… um, it's meant to be there on purpose? 
Hah～, modern clothes nowadays are quite complicated. I've learnt something new.
choice_data_list: Let's pick out some clothes for you.
text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute

text_block_list.text: Oh my, really? Alrighty then, I'll leave it up to you to pick out a more modern outfit for me. Fufufu.
text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute

text_block_list.text: Wowee… thank you, really. You kept me company for the entire day.
choice_data_list: No, I should be the one thanking you.
text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute

text_block_list.text: The billiard hall, a cafe, a clothes store. I was happy that she put in all this effort to choose places I'd like. But when I tried to tell her this—
No way. Those places were very foreign to me, so I ended up causing you a lot of trouble. But—
text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute

text_block_list.text: I had a really great time… You taught me so many new things and I was happily following along.
choice_data_list: I had fun too, it was very relaxing.
I had fun too, it was very relaxing.
text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute

text_block_list.text: Even in those places, if I'm with Wonder Acute, time passes by quite leisurely, and I can feel myself smiling just as effortlessly. That's why—
choice_data_list: If it's alright with you, let's do it again!

text_block_list.text: Oh my, hm…
text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute

text_block_list.text: … Yeah. Let's try and line up our schedules to do this again.
text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute

text_block_list.text: Fufufu… "let's do it again", saying something like that.
text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute

text_block_list.text: My, oh my… I'm pleased to see such a happy face. Have some black tea as well, deary. It'll be nice and warm since I kept it in a thermos.
text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute

text_block_list.text: Trainer, you were smiling just like that time…
text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute

text_block_list.text: I see… you were having fun this whole time.
text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute
